column1: low full toss on off stump, hit back past the bowler off the front foot. Nice to get bat on ball, but not hit well  enough. Goes through to mid on
full outside off, driven crisply past point. Beats the infield, and the chase from the man is futile. Lovely shot, played while walking forward
full outside off, tries to drive straight, but there's swing in the air, thereby inducing the inside edge. Down to fine leg
full on middle stump, clipped off his toes, and it beats midwicket. Chase for the fielder, who does excellently to parry it back
dropped! Full outside off, a floaty delivery. Tries to drive, but too late to play it. Takes the outside edge, but dropped by the keeper diving to his left. Movement in the air
full on off stump, put away through the covers! Overpitched and driven past the two fielders inside the circle in front of square. Sweet shot
full outside off, and angling across the right hander. Tries to drive away from his body, but misses. Through to the keeper
full on off stump, tapped to cover
full on off stump, hit down the ground past the bowler. Stopped by mid off

short on leg stump, gets big on the batsman after cramping him. Tries to glance it fine down the leg side, but can't make the connection. Comes off his body as the ball lands near short leg. They scamper through
good length on off stump, angling into the left hander, flicked off his pads to midwicket off the front foot
full on off stump, tries to lift this over the bowler's head, but mistimes it. Inside edge takes it through to deep midwicket instead
full on midlde and leg, no turn first up. Tapped to mid off for a quick single
back of a length on middle stump, he backs away but the ball angles into him anyway. Tries to cut, but too close to his body. Straight to point
good length outside off, batsman charges down the wicket but misses his inside-out shot. Takes the inside edge to short third man
full on middle and off, Short backs away to make some extra room. Firmly driven down the ground, but stopped by mid off
good length outside off, Harris makes some room and slaps it over point! Off the middle of the bat
good length outside off once again, backs away and attempts another cut, but straight to the man inside the circle
full on leg stump, charges down the ground and smacks it over mid on. Clears the infield and races away to the cow corner boundary

full on middle and leg, angling down the leg side but raps his pads as he misses the flick. They race across for the single anyway as Watson can't get to the ball. Shoulder charge between Watson and Harris as the bowler tried to retrieve it
back of a length on middle and leg, tapped back to Watson with soft hands

full and wide outside off, too much width and Harris punishes this. Bends his knee, staying low, and slaps this past point. Safe shot, played along the ground, and earns him four after beating the infield
full just outside off, hit straight down the ground. Watson can't stop it from going through him. There's a man at long on
leg stump full toss, and it's been put away! Just walks across to the off side and flicks this well. Hit fine, and fine leg can't stop this from hitting the ropes
short and wide outside off, cut along the carpet, and beats both point and cover point. Both men chasing behind it, and Rohrer's diving effort in the deep pulls it back. Sandhu throws it back in

dropped by Fawad! Lucky for the fielder, it's a no ball. Short on leg stump, walks across to the off side and flicks it fine once again. It's well hit this time, and goes straight to short fine leg. But it pops out of his hands!

another chance! slower ball, full and wide outside off. The batsman tries a wild swing at it, and it takes a thick outside edge. Inches beyond the outstretched hands of short third man. No stopping that
good length on off stump, tries to pull but too close to his body for that. Goes under the bat
back of a length on leg stump, pulled with the ball going across his body. Takes a leading edge and trickles down to mid off
back of a length on off stump, muscled to mid off from the back foot
short outside off, and soars over the batsman's head. That's another extra. Too short

full outside off, and it's smacked over the bowler's head. Not hit well enough, and lands a few feet inside the long-off boundary. Chase for mid off, and the man pulls it back. Saves only one run, though
full outside off, smacked to mid off. Hit too well, no single
back of a length on off stump, Harries backs away and cuts, but stopped by the cover-point fielder who runs to his left
fuller ball on off stump, Harris backs away again and carves this over the infield. Terrific shot, lands inches short of the deep cover boundary
full on off stump, comes down the ground and slaps it square. Straight to cover
full toss on middle stump, Harris backs away and muscles it over the infield one more time. Slapped over cover point
back of a length outside off, too much width offered and cut furiously off the back foot. Goes just past point, and there's more chasing for the fielder
full on off stump, turning into the right hander and clipped off the front foot. They walk across for the single as the man goes to cow corner
good length on middle stump, spins away from the left hander, cut off the back foot. Diving effort from point induces the stop, but misfield allows them to race across
good length on middle, legspin. Flicked off his pads to midwicket
full on middle stump, tapped down the ground to long on. Only a single

back of a length outside off, tries to punch off the back foot, but takes the outside edge. Trickles down only to short third man, but they want a single. Danger at the non-striker's end, but Short just about makes it
back of a length on middle stump, backs away and cuts. But well stopped by point
full on off stump, slogged towards the leg side, and drops just short of midwicket! The fielder can't hold on to it either, and they scamper through for runs
offcutter on off stump, slows things down, and induces the batsman to play his shot early. Hit in the air towards cow corner, but lands between wide long on and deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, pulled along the ground to deep midwicket. No real timing
short on leg stump, but Harris had backed away towards the leg side anyway. Slapped over the infield but falls just short of James VInce in the deep. Almost carried!
back of a length on off stump, muscled down the ground to long on. Tried to pull, but hit too straight

there's the first maximum! Good length on middle stump, and smacked over the cow-corner boundary! In the slot to be hit, and sent packing by Harris. Delightful sound off the willow. A pity that the spectator in the crowd dropped it. Ninety-nine metres
full and wide outside off, tries to sweep anyway, but misses with the ball slightly turning away from the right hander

it's the one that goes straight through, and there's the breakthrough! Good length outside off, but it's the wrong'un on this occasion. Short came dancing down the wicket, trying to flick it towards leg side, but he played for the leg spin. The ball zips between his bat and pad, and that's easily stumped by the keeper
wayward first ball to the new batsman. Full outside leg stump, clipped off his boots to short fine leg. Oh dear, misfield from the man there
full on off stump, the wrong'un once more. Driven down the ground to long on
good length on middle stump, slows things down this time. Harris waits for ages before cutting past point. Man in the deep
full outside off, legspin this time, and it's driven inside out over cover. Hit so well that it lands inches beyond the long-off boundary. Great use of the wrists
good length on leg stump, nudged off his pads with soft hands towards deep midwicket. Nice, early call for the second run
short on leg stump, pulled behind square. Safe shot, played along the ground. But stopped by deep midwicket racing to his left
full outside off, driven square off the front foot to deep extra cover. Sandhu, inside the circle, could've stopped that
good length on middle stump, tries to clip this towards the leg side, but takes a leading edge towards cover. That's Harris' fifty!
short outside off, pulled, but not hit well enough. Trickles down to deep midwicket
back of a length on leg stump, tries to flick this behind square but comes off the thigh. Goes fine anyway, forcing Fawad at short third man to retrieve
full outside off, and Harris charges down the ground first up! Smacked over the non-striker's head, and it lands full on the rope! Not the best shot from Harris, but had enough muscle behind it

slips in the middle, and he's run out! Disaster! Good length on off stump, cut to point and Cooper was off in a flash. Harris refuses the run (there wasn't any on offer anyway), and Cooper tries to turn around. But he slips, and the throw from point is on top of the stumps
good length on off stump, backs away and cuts. But straight to point. Loud 'no' this time
full on middle stump, it's the wrong'un, and takes the leading edge off Harris' on-side drive. Goes through to long off
full on off stump, big stride forward and defended back to Fawad
good length on off stump, Bravo tries to defend off the front foot, but the wrong'un gets the inside edge. Straight to short fine leg
full outside off, down on one knee and slapped past cover point. In the air, but beats cover point. Races away thereafter

good length on middle and off, slower ball and he attempts a pull. Goes under the bat, and through to the keeper. But Sandhu's appealing for the caught behind. The umpire's not interested, but it looks like it took a bottom edge to the keeper. The bowler's gonna feel unlucky
good length on middle and leg, pulled along the ground to cow corner.
back of a length outside off, tries to lift this inside out over cover but misses the shot. Extra bounce
good length on off stump, but it's the offcutter. Slower ball, as it angles down the leg side with Bravo walking across to the off side
full on off stump, and Bravo tries to drive again. But can't get the perfect timing. Outside edge takes it past the keeper. Nair has to run across from short third man
overpitched outside off stump, tries to hit this over cover once again, and can't make any connection this time. Loses his shape while trying to play at it
full outside leg stump, tries to flick towards the leg side but comes off his thigh pad. Taken by the keeper on the leg side, and big appeal for the caught behind! Nope, says the umpire
good length on off stump, punched to cover for a quick single. Early call for the run
good length on middle stump, pulled to cow corner and Sandhu's getting under it...but dropped! Hits Sandhu in the stomach as the ball goes through his hands in the deep. Harris gets another reprieve
Relief for Sandhu, for certain! Yorker on off stump. Harris comes down the ground, but it's a real quick delivery. Goes under Harris' bat, and crashes into off stump
good length outside off, pulled over midwicket to Vince in the deep
full ball just outside off, slight nip into the right hander. Defended off the front foot
full outside off, and it's driven towards cover, but takes a thick outside edge. Powerfully hit, and that flies away over backward point and into the boundary
back of a length outside off, pulled along the ground to midwicket. Calls early for the single, but could've been dangerous if the throw was a direct hit
short outside off, soars over Bravo's head as he pulls out of any shot. The umpire agrees
back of a length outside off, checks his drive as the ball hits the top of his bat. Lobs away to cover

back of a length outside off, slower ball that grips the surface. Gets big on Bravo, as his attempted defense lobs away past the non-striker. It was in the air, but too much work for Watson to get to it
good length on middle and leg, spinning down the leg side anyway
good length on off stump, excellent wrong'un. Cramps Bravo for room, as he attempts to cut late. Takes an inside edge, and through to short fine leg
full on off stump, spins into Pollard with the ball staying low. Defended well off the back foot
good length outside off, and once again spinning into Pollard. Doesn't look like the batsman picked that. Tapped back to the bowler
good length on off stump, flicked off his pads to midwicket for a walking single
full on middle and off, turned off his pads to deep midwicket on this occasion
full on off stump, big stride forward and defended
good length on off stump, angling into the right hander, tries to flick off his pads, but misses. Takes his thigh as the ball trickles away towards the leg side
good length on middle and off, pulled along the ground to cow corner. Hit hard, but not timed well

back of a length outside off, worked away towards the leg side off the back foot. They want the second run with the ball going to cow corner, but Bravo slips this time! Luckily he was already inside his crease
short on leg stump, and it's the slower ball, but Bravo spotted it early. Muscled over cow corner for a maximum! Came off the bottom of the bat, but so what! Muscled
short on middle stump, pulled but the bat turns in his hand. Slices his shot, and it's in the air. Taken by the bowler running forward. Simple catch
on a good length outside off, angling into the right hander. Turned off his hips to square leg
full outside off, and it's been smacked! Deep midwicket and wide long on are mere spectators. Got under the length of the ball and dragged it towards the leg side. Phew
good length but wide outside off, angles away from Pollard as he misses the cut. Slower ball

short on middle stump, Pollard's in no position to pull but he attempts it anyway. Takes a top edge, and it hangs in the air as the keeper scampers through to his left. Puts the dive in, but the ball lands inches away from his fingertips
back of a length outside off stump, opens the bat's face and runs it down to third man
overpitched wide outside off, slapped away to deep point. Forced the batsman to reach at it. Not bowling straight to Pollard any longer. Offering him the width, instead
full on off stump, driven with the bat's open face to deep cover. Wildermuth will keep strike
back of a length outside off, cut away from his body, but beats point. McClenaghan, at deep cover, races across to his left, but the ball can't be stopped. Beats the fielder to the point boundary
good length outside off once more, cut away but not timed well at all. Goes to the man in the deep
good length outside off, drags his pull to deep midwicket
floats into the stands at cow corner! Walks across to the off side even before the ball was delivered, and Green follows him will a full toss outside off. Smacked over the man in the deep
good length on off stump, cut off the back foot to deep point
full and wide outside off, down on one knee, but the slog sweep does no come off. Pinged straight to the man at cow corner. He'll keep strike
excellent yorker. Pitches just outside leg stump and goes between the batsman's legs
low full toss on leg stump, misses the yorker and punished this time. Flicked off his boots behind square. Beats the man at fine leg!
good length very wide outside off, pulled back past Sandhu to long on. They'll get the second easily
slower ball full and wide outside off. Pollard tries to send this out of the park, but through his shot too early. Forced KP to reach for the ball, which he's not good at

slower ball on middle stump, and this time Pollard gets under it. Dragged towards the leg side, but doesn't have the distance. Green and Rohrer come together near cow corner, but Green calls for the catch. Well taken, diving forward
back of a length outside off, and it's cut off the back foot. But straight to point! Soft dismissal. Another wicket earned thanks to the slower ball
short outside off, easy for the new man. Slapped over point, and deep cover has no chance. Starts off with a first-ball boundary
slower ball, but wayward. Pitches full, but very very wide outside off

excellent slower ball yorker on middle stump, somehow gets his bat down and takes the inside edge towards the leg side. Replays show it actually hit his boot. Should've been out, as the bowler's appeal for lbw was turned down
full on off stump, tapped past the bowler's right to long off
short outside off, and it's another one that goes way beyond the wide guidelines. Slipped out of his hand perhaps
he was waiting for the short ball outside off, and Webster gets exactly that! It's short, it's wide outside off, and it's pulled over deep midwicket for a sixer!
full on off stump, and that's been lifted over square leg on this occasion! Falls just beyond James Vince in the deep. Hit so well
full and wide outside off, smacked past cover, and it's been creamed! Races away to the deep extra cover boundary and that's 25 runs off the final over. Renegades finish on 189 for 6
full on leg stump, clipped off his toes to midwicket
good length on off stump, cut off the back foot but can't go past cover point
good length on leg stump, goes straight through. Punched off the back foot
back of a length on middle and leg, flicked off his hips to deep backward square
back of a length wide outside off, too wide infact. He tries to cut anyway, and takes the bottom edge
full on leg stump, smacked back to the bowler. Cooper's done his job with the ball once more. Excellent over
good length on off stump, tries to flick towards the leg side but totally played down the wrong line. The ball straightened after pitching, forcing the error from Vince
good length on leg stump, tries to pull but takes a thick top edge! In the air for a really long time, but Holland does well to gauge the height. Taken from near fine leg
good length on off stump, punched off the back foot past cover. Work for the infielder
good length on leg stump, clipped off his pads to square leg. Not timed well
back of a length on off stump, rocks back and punches it back to the bowler off the back foot. Tight line from Tremain

back of a length outside off, carved off the back foot, and beats the infield. Webster chases behind it, and somehow parries it back with his body hitting the ropes. Is that a boundary? We need to check
good length on off stump, goes deep into the crease and punched back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, tries an extravagant pull but the extra bounce takes it over Watson's blade
good length outside off, punched off the back foot, but straight to cover point
good length on off stump, defended off the front foot with soft hands. Firmly hit back
back of a length outside off, angles in but seams away after pitching. Watson considers poking at it, but misses
short outside off, and pulled over wide long on! Stays deep in his crease and picks the length up early. Sends it packing thereafter
full outside off, angling across and away from the left hander. Tries to drive, but can't make contact
good length on middle stump, pulled but not off the middle of the bat. Doesn't have the distance, and taken by Webster at deep midwicket. Calmly taken. Thunder in big trouble
back of a length outside off, stays deep in his crease and punches to mid off. No run
good length on off stump, pulls it behind square on this occasion. Simply helps this ball on its way as it lands beyond the backward square boundary. Rolled his wrists over that shot
good length on off stump, and it's pulled once again! Tremain getting some treatment here, now. In the slot to be hit, and Watson's played it so well. Lands in the crowd
good length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover. Tremain does not look happy
slower ball from DJ to start off, and he slips once again! Lands full on off stump, and it's played with soft hands towards the off side
good length on middle and leg, clipped off his pads to short fine leg. Lenton wants the single, but nothing's there
back of a length on leg stump,pulled well but hit along the ground to the man in the deep
good length outside off, tries to cut but plays over the ball with the delivery staying low. Bottom edged to the keeper
good length on middle, and it's an exquisite pull! Quick to swivel, and smacked over deep midwicket!
full on off stump, and that's lifted over the bowler's head! Excellent strike, off the middle of the bat and soars into the stands
full on middle and leg, clipped off his pads to deep backward square. Struck well
good length on leg stump, slower ball this time. Cramped for room as the ball zips through between his bat and pad. Could've very easily have chopped it onto his leg stump
good length on leg stump once again. Another slower ball and Lenton taps it back to Richardson
around the wicket now, and it's delivered full outside off. Carves it behind square and the dive from point can't stop it either
full on off stump, but it's the slower one. Tapped to mid off for a single
knee-high full toss on middle and leg, turned off the front foot behind square, but straight to the man at short fine leg
good length on leg stump, tapped back to the bowler off the front foot
back of a length outside off, cut off the back foot but too close to his body. Chops it down to point, as they scamper through for the run
good length on off stump, tries to drive down the ground but comes off the top half of the bat. Falls in front of mid off

What. A. Catch. Full on middle stump, and Watson lifts this towards the leg side. No distance on this occasion, as Pollard races in from deep midwicket and slides forward near midwicket to complete a very difficult take. Watto's gotta go
full outside off and anging further away from the left hander. Forces the batsman to reach at it, but can't make any contact
good length on off stump, rocks back and tries to slap it past point, but not timed well
good length on middle stump, punched off the back foot to long on
full on off stump, driven down the ground once again. Long off manning that boundary
full on off stump, bunted down the ground to long off once again
full on middle stump, nudged off his boots to deep backward square. Dangerous call to take the second, but completed in the end
full on middle stump, chipped off the front foot towards wide long on, and it's taken in the deep! Checked his shot,  and paid the price for it
good length just outside off, cut late off the back foot to third man
back of a length outside off, pokes at it and glances it down fine. Third man intercepts in the deep
full on off stump, smacked off the front foot past cover. Goes to the man in the deep
good length on middle and off, tapped off the back foot past point. More singles
short outside off, and soars over Nair's head. He tentatively ducks under it, and the umpire calls it a legal delivery
full on off stump, walks across to the off side and paddles this over the keeper's head! Scooped behind, and beats short fine leg's chase
second tier! Full outside off, and he gets his front foot out of the way for this slog. Muscled over cow corner off the front foot, and deep midwicket is a mere spectator. Boom!
full ball on middle and leg, opens the bat's face and taps it towards cover. They scamper across for the single
good length on off stump, tapped off the back foot to deep point
good length on leg stump, turned off his pads to deep backward square off the back foot. Holland's bowling has been tight, with no real width for the batsman to play with
full on middle stump, turned with minimal footwork towards midwicket
slog swept! Full outside off, and Nair is quick to get down on one knee. Muscles it over the deep midwicket boundary, and that's another half-a-dozen!
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot towards the deep-cover fielder
slower ball yorker on off stump, flicked off the bat's toe end to square leg

slower ball on a good length outside off, pulled but with no real power behind it. Webster attacked the ball, but it lands just short of him. Super effort, but the ball goes past him after that, forcing the extra run
caught behind, but overstepped! Full outside off, tries to drive towards cover, and takes a feather edge behind. The keeper's celebrating, but realises that Pollard has overstepped
full use of the free hit! Full ball outside off stump, gets his front foot out of the way and slogged over deep midwicket. In the stands!
good length outside off, backs away and cuts to the man in the deep
good length on middle stump, cut off the back foot to deep point. Only a single
back of a length, slower ball outside off, punched off the back foot to extra cover. Chase for the man at deep point, but he intercepts before the ball could reach the boundary

slower ball on off stump, tapped towards the non-striker as Bravo chases behind it. They want the single, and that forces Bravo to aim at the non-striker's stumps, but makes a mess of the throw. It's awry, and allows them to take that single after all
full on leg stump, clipped off his toes fine behind square. There's fine leg in the deep, though, but Nair comes back for the second
good length on middle stump, and angling across Nair's body. Tries to carve this towards point, but can't make any contact. Loses his balance while attempting the cut from near his body
slower ball on a good length on middle and leg, slogged along the carpet to deep midwicket. Nair slightly checks his shot towards the end
low full toss on off stump, tapped to long off, and Rohrer calls early for the second run
slower ball, but full on middle stump. Turned off his toes to deep midwicket. Two on offer, but only a single taken. Rohrer keeps strike
yorker on middle stump, dug away to cover off the front foot. Gives Nair the strike
full toss on middle stump, chipped over the infield on the leg side. Intercepted by Pollard at deep midwicket
back of a length on middle stump, flicked off his pads, but takes his thigh on the way down the leg side. Allows Nair to take the second as well
full ball on off stump, muscled towards the leg side, but there's the man in the deep for that shot
full on middle stump, squeezed away well down the ground. Played to long off

full outside off, once again slogged towrads the leg side. It's been hit between the two men in the deep, but Pollard (once again, it's that man!) races across to his left and pulls it inside with a diving effort
full outside off, and it's slapped over the infield with some power! It's very well hit infact. Lands beyond the extra cover boundary. Dropped in the stands
full on off stump once again, and this time it's crunched over cover! Races away to the boundary once it clears the infield

full on middle stump, tapped down the ground past the non-striker, and it beats mid of as well! The fielder's chasing behind it, but looks like the ball will win the race. Yes, it does. Fourteen off the first three balls

muscled over cow corner! Full on middle and leg, and Rohrer gets his front foot out of the way before swinging his bat through the ball's line. Magical connection off the bat, and lands in the crowd once again
full and wide outside off, slapped behind square over point. And this is four more! Pings away off the bat

full outside off once again, and Rohrer makes it six in a row! Sticks his bat out and makes a good connection with it. Flies between short third man and point, and it crashes into the deep point boundary. Twenty eight runs off that over!
back of a length outside off, tries to pull but comes off the bat's toe end. Sliced shot, and taken by long on
back of a length on off stump, backs away and smacks this over point. Looks like it has enough muscle behind that shot but falls just short of the boundary
finally a dot ball off Rohrer. Full on off stump, and smacked back to the bowler. Well stopped on the follow through
back of a length outside off, angling into Rohrer with Richardson bowling around the wicket. In two minds this time, and pulls out of the pull shot very late
low full toss outside off, muscled over cover, and in the gap once again! No one at deep extra cover, and the ball goes one-bounce for four
slower ball full on off stump, tries to lift this over the leg side, but holes out to deep midwicket. It's the change of pace that does the trick, and Rohrer just can't generate enough power
slower ball full on leg stump, misses the leg-side sweep, and hits his pads. Big appeal for lbw, but turned down from the umpire. Impact was probably outside leg stump
full on middle stump, slower ball once more. Nudged off his toes to the leg side
slower ball once again. Full outside off. Muscled down the ground to long on. Slight misfield from Cooper, but he ensures they can't steal a second
full outside off, muscled off the back foot towards the off side. But only to Richardson at cover
full on off stump, muscled down the ground to long on
low full toss on off stump, bunted back to Bravo, who sticks his hand out. Hits his palm, and that must've stung. Bravo is in some pain as he makes his way to the outfield

full outside off, and it's smacked over the bowler's head. Hit well, but looks like it doesn't have the distance. Holes out to long on, who takes an easy catch from near his face. Richardson on a hattrick!
back of a length outside off, beats the outside edge as Green misses the back-foot punch
full on off stump, bunted down the ground to long off. Can't get any elevation in that shot
back of a length on off stump, angling across the left hander. Opens the bat's face and runs it down to backward point

full on off stump, tries an extravagant slog towards the leg side, but the leading edge takes it to wide long off instead. Simple catch in the deep. This time it's Webster, and Richardson takes his fourth
full outside off, muscled over mid off, but falls short of Short at long off
slower ball full outside off, Green winds up and smacks that through the line of the ball. Lands beyond the deep-midwicket boundary. The fans loved that!
slower ball yorker on middle stump. Dug away towards cow corner, and they'll get a comfortable second
full and wide outside off, and another big wind up from Green! Waits for the ball to get to him, and then smacks it over cow corner! What a terrific shot
low full toss on off stump, muscled away off the back foot to point. Well stopped by the infielder
yorker on middle stump, turned towards the leg side with soft hands. Smart batting from MM, allows him to take the second run
good length wide outside off, tapped to point but only a single. He'll keep strike

full on leg stump, tries a leg-side flick and misses. Raps his pads and Tremain goes up for the lbw appeal. But not out. Pitched probably outside leg stump, but they scamper across for the single. Wayward throw allows them to collect the extra run
full on middle stump, mistimed slog towards the leg side. Played so gently that it allows McClenaghan to take another double. Only 18 needed off 10 now
knee-high full toss on middle stump, clipped hard to the man at deep midwicket
full toss outside off, smacked to deep extra cover off the back foot. Green's taking the fielder on, and he manages to complete the second run. Fifteen needed off 8
overpitched full outside off,  lands just inside the guidelines. Terrific delivery. Dot ball as the batsman can't reach out to it
full and wide outside off, crunched off the front foot to deep point. Green will keep the strike. Fourteen needed for Thunder to keep their season alive

full outside off, tries to slog this over the bowler's head, but this time Green slices it. In the air, and it's taken by the man at point. Slight drift away from the fielder as the ball comes down to Earth, but he composes himself and completes the catch
slower ball on off stump, muscled towards the leg side. Not hit hard enough, and allows the batsman to complete another second
yorker on leg stump, pinged to deep midwicket as he hits it too well. No chance of a second run here. No. 11 will have to face the next ball
back of a length outside off stump, slower ball that Fawad can't pull. Misses the shot, and it shoud've been a wide with the ball going over his head. But it's called a dot
low full toss on off stump, bunted to midwicket for only a single

slower ball full on middle stump, McClenaghan misses the slog and that's lbw. Impact in front of middle stump and Renegades win by nine runs! Renegades move to third for now, but not confirmed of qualification yet. They still have a game to go. Sydney Thunder are eliminated.
